title: How to start teaching a 14-year-old boy piano - Quora

response.answer_text: [A2A] Boy pianos are a temperamental bunch: boisterous, difficult to control, and prone to making a huge racket. You’re much better off with girl pianos: although they’re highly strung and can be somewhat delicate and capricious, once you soothe their anxieties, they can hit the high notes very well.
